rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Florete[/i] – Whenever Mist, Hero's Valkyrie becomes blocked, she gains lifelink until end of turn.
[i]Sister's Aid[/i] – {W}{U}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to another target creature you control.
[i]Support Master[/i] – If a [i]Pair Up[/i] ability you control would trigger, it triggers an additional time.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{U}{W}
